thumb.title: UR COOKED!! - Pomegranola & drpdmr (Self Cover)
thumb.description: ➤ 召し上がれ！drpdmr: "First original release!! Thank you for working with me, Pome! From keeping up with my horrid schedule to producing a song I'm proud to call my first release! Thank you to everyone involved!"➤ CREDITS クレジット─ PRODUCTION/MIX/MASTER 楽曲 : Pomegranola https://x.com/pomegranola─ SONGWRITING/VOCALS 歌詞・歌 : Pomegranola https://x.com/pomegranola drpdmr https://x.com/drpdmr─ ILLUST イラスト : 九藤咲織 (Saori Kudou) https://x.com/Saori_Kudou_─ SONG LOGO ロゴ : Nutnut https://x.com/NutnutYe─ GUITAR SOLO/ELECTRIC BASS ギター・ベース : Younger Bro─ ART PUPPETING イラスト動き : Dan https://x.com/Dan_drage1─ MOVIE 映像 : Amilim and Reisth https://x.com/AmilimandReisth─ ALBUM COVER アルバムデザイン : kateellec https://x.com/kateellec➤ LINKS─ STREAMING LINK ストリーミング : https://distrokid.com/hyperfollow/pomegranolaanddrpdmr/ur-cooked─ INST 絆創 : https://drive.google.com/file/d/1zwWDl2XnL5gh-lQ3Vbz4iYe0dmpi_UyJ/view?usp=sharing─ LYRICS 歌詞 : https://docs.google.com/document/d/17RRSbfl9zyWXraMjBFtgG4AcgrHHMNQh76z4X3Ng6fU/edit?usp=sharing
